channel.title: Milestone 3 Requirements (Spring 2022) :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: Web Only This textbook was authored for the CIS 400 - Object-Oriented Design, Implementation, and Testing course at Kansas State University. This section describes assignments specific to the Fall 2022 offering of that course. If you are not enrolled in the course, please disregard this section. For this milestone, you will be creating some additional menu item classes and refactoring others. This will involve refactoring some already written classes, as well as adding some new ones.
